fields.name: NOTICE_DATE
fields.doc: date and time of notice creation

fields.name: SOURCE_OBJ
fields.doc: name of the object that is undergoing the transient outburst

fields.name: REF_NUM
fields.doc: string of alpha and digits uniquely identifying event

fields.name: SRC_RA
fields.doc: RA of the source object undergoing the transient outburst in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: SRC_DEC
fields.doc: Dec of the source object undergoing the transient outburst in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: CRAB_FLUX
fields.doc: current intensity of the source object in mCrab units [mCrab]

fields.name: BASELINE_FLUX
fields.doc: baseline intensity of the source before the transient outburst occurred [cnts/cm2/sec]

fields.name: SIGNIF
fields.doc: significance of the increase of the source outburst [sigma]

fields.name: SOLN_STATUS
fields.doc: 32 Flag Bits. See https://gcn.gsfc.nasa.gov/sock_pkt_def_doc.html for definition of misc[18] bits, some bits may not be defined

fields.name: MISC_2
fields.doc: 32 Flag Bits. See https://gcn.gsfc.nasa.gov/sock_pkt_def_doc.html for definition of misc[19] bits, some bits may not be defined
